item.description:
The King of the Leprechauns invites All Friendly Pups for a Fun Day of Frolicking at Best Friends Sunday March 17th from 1:00pm-3:00pm. Bring your pooch down to Exercise & Socialize with friends their own size while they hunt for 4 leaf clovers or help drive the snakes out of Ireland.
Proof of Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella

Special treat for pups wearing a bit o'green!
item.name: Saint Patrick's Day!
